modules.title: HTML Introduction & Web Basics
modules.description: Covers HTML Introduction & Web Basics with practical HTML concepts and usage.

seo.meta_title: HTML Introduction & Web Basics | HTML Module
seo.meta_description: Learn HTML fundamentals and web basics — how browsers render pages, what HTML is, and how it fits into the web ecosystem.
seo.og_description: Get started with HTML and understand the core concepts behind how the web works.
seo.twitter_description: Learn what HTML is and how it powers the web.

modules.title: HTML Document Structure
modules.description: Covers HTML Document Structure with practical HTML concepts and usage.

seo.meta_title: HTML Document Structure | HTML Module
seo.meta_description: Understand how an HTML document is structured — DOCTYPE, html, head, and body elements explained with examples.
seo.og_description: Learn how to properly structure an HTML document from DOCTYPE to closing tags.
seo.twitter_description: Learn how HTML documents are structured and organized.

modules.title: HTML Boilerplate Template
modules.description: Covers HTML Boilerplate Template with practical HTML concepts and usage.

seo.meta_title: HTML Boilerplate Template | HTML Module
seo.meta_description: Learn what an HTML boilerplate is and how to use it as a starting point for every web project.

seo.twitter_description: Use the HTML boilerplate as your starting point for every project.

modules.description: Covers HTML DOM Fundamentals with practical HTML concepts and usage.

seo.meta_title: HTML DOM Fundamentals | HTML Module
